title: all my files save and open with firefox
content:
when i go to download anything it downloads with a little firefox logo on a dark backround, and when i try and open the download, it wont open and continuously open the same pop up saying "what should firefox do with this file" and there is nothing for me to change it to that helps


PLEASE help, i really want to download a file but it just wont work
creator: petuniababy681

title: Bad Request
content:
I have latest version of Firefox have had no problems before. 

I use netzero .net for email and have for years with no problems. Now everytime I try to access netzero for e-mails I get Bad Request Your Browser sent a request that this could not understand. Size of a request Header exceeds server limit.
creator: decoffer

title: videos entrecortados de Youtube
content: tengo el firefox 112, pero tengo el problema q los videos de youtube se ven entrecortados en audio y video, tb los reels de Facebook, probé poniendo Firefox en modo seguro sin complementos y seguía eso, alguna ayuda antes no estaba así, y no quiero cambiar de navegador..
creator: willy_0311

title: No puedo abrir mis cuentas de outlook
content: intento abrir mi cuenta de outlook y no me abre, logro iniciar sesión y de allí no pasa, se que es el navegador porque inicie sesión en otros navegadores y todo sin problemas
